formalpara.title: Figure 3. C. elegans type IV collagen genes
formalpara.para: The a1 and a2(IV) collagen chains are represented with amino and carboxyl-terminal domains grayed. The central Gly-X-Y domain is open with black bars representing interruptions of the repeats. Locations of known mutations are indicated and the alternatively spliced region of LET-2 is highlighted.
